description:
When the boys end up in the school cafeteria, they meet the beautiful and hardworking Hanayo wearing her apron and bandana.
With the weather growing too cold to eat outside, the boys happily agree to eat lunch indoors, but Yuki does not share their excitement.
He has been collecting stickers from bags of bread and hopes to redeem them for a plate.
Later, Yuki witnesses Hanayo eatingi bread during the break. Yuki learns they are both collecting the same stickers, giving rise to a strange relationship between the two.
Source: crunchyroll
